2: <mistake>'chang//sangs</mistake> rgyas thams cad bskyed pa <mistake>po //sangs</mistake> rgyas sras po <mistake>dma</mistake> <mistake>pa mchog /shes</mistake> rab <mistake>srid</mistake> <mistake>'byung</mistake> <mistake>skye gnas</mistake> <mistake>te//chos</mistake> kyi <mistake>skya</mistake> gnas srid <mistake>mthar</mistake> <mistake>byed//gcig</mistake> pu <mistake>sa</mistake> <mistake>mkhregs</mistake> <mistake>rdo</mistake> <mistake>rje'i</mistake> <mistake>bdag/</mistake>
3: <mistake>'phral</mistake> du bskyed pa 'gro ba'i <mistake>bdag /nam</mistake> mkha' las byung <mistake>radg</mistake> byung <mistake>ba/shes</mistake> rab ye shes me bo <mistake>che//'od</mistake> chen rnam par <mistake>snang</mistake> <mistake>bar byed//ye</mistake> shes <mistake>snang</mistake> ba lam me <mistake>ba//'grod</mistake> ba'i <mistake>mar</mistake> me ye shes
4: <mistake>sgron//gzi</mistake> <mistake>brjid</mistake> chen po 'od gsal <mistake>ba //rig</mistake> pa'i rgyal mchog <mistake>sngags</mistake> dbang <mistake>po'//gsang</mistake> <mistake>sngags</mistake> rgyal po don chen <mistake>byed//gtsug</mistake> tor chen po rmad <mistake>byunr</mistake> <mistake>gtsug nam</mistake> mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs
5: <mistake>ston //sangs</mistake> rgyas kun bdag <mistake>dngos</mistake> po <mistake>mchog /'gro</mistake> ba dga' <mistake>ba'</mistake> mig dang <mistake>ldan/sna</mistake> tshogs gzugs can bskyed pa <mistake>pao//mchod</mistake> 'os rjed 'os drang srong <mistake>che//rigs</mistake> gsum 'chang ba gsang <mistake>sngags</mistake>
6: <mistake>ldan//dam</mistake> <mistake>tshig</mistake> chen po gsang <mistake>sngags</mistake> <mistake>'dzin//gtso</mistake> bo <mistake>dgkon</mistake> mchog gsum 'dzin <mistake>pa// theg</mistake> pa gsum mchog ston pa <mistake>po/ /don</mistake> yod zhags pa rnam par <mistake>rgyal//'dzin</mistake> pa chen po rdo rje <mistake>zhags//rdo</mistake> rje
7: <mistake>zcags</mistake> kyu zhags pa <mistake>che//shin</mistake> tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi <mistake>dbyings</mistake> kyi ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad ba rkang pas dman <mistake>a</mistake> nyi shu <mistake>rtsa</mistake> <mistake>lnga'o///rdo</mistake> rje 'jigs byed 'jigs <mistake>par</mistake> <mistake>byed//khro</mistake> <mistake>bo'i</mistake> rgyal po gdong
8: drug <mistake>'jigs//mig</mistake> drug lag drug stobs dang <mistake>ldan//keng</mistake> <mistake>rus mche</mistake> ba gtsigs pa <mistake>po//ha</mistake> la ha la <mistake>gdong</mistake> brgya <mistake>pa//gshin</mistake> rje mthar byed bgegs kyi <mistake>rgyal//rdo</mistake> rje shugs can
